Title: 🇺🇸🇳🇿⚡️- German-Finnish hacker Kim Dotcom will be extradited t...
Description: 🇺🇸🇳🇿⚡️- German-Finnish hacker Kim Dotcom will be extradited to the United States by order of the New Zealand Minister of Justice.Kim Dotcom is most known for his reporting on the death of Seth Rich, a former Democrat staffer who reportedly leaked the personal emails of DNC leadership in 2016, as well as his support for Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

Title: ↩️ 🇲🇲⚡- Chinese Foreign Minister, Wang Yi, met Myanmar's Junta ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇲🇲⚡- Unconfirmed reports, internal coup within the Tadmadaw, Myanmar. Min Aung Hlaing, Myanmar's Junta Leader and Head of the Tatmadaw, has allegedly been detained by Aung Lin Dwe, Lt. General of the Tatmadaw. 🇲🇲⚡- Chinese Foreign Minister, Wang Yi, met Myanmar's Junta Leader and Head of the Tatmadaw, Min Aung Hlaing, in Naypyidaw, Myanmar, expressing China’s support for Myanmar. The meeting comes two days after rumors spread of an internal coup, which the Tatmadaw denied.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Both sides have clarified that the towns of Gorde...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Fierce clashes over the city of Koronevo, Kursk region, Russia – Russian sources confirm. Ukrainian forces are attempting a pincer movement on Koronevo, where in the north the towns of Olgovka and Matveeka have become grey-zones. The control of Koronevo… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Both sides have clarified that the towns of Gordeevka, Viktorovka, Vnezapnoe and Uspenovka are under Ukrainian control, north Kursk region, Russia.In the center, Russian forces have recaptured the vital town of Martynovka – confirmed moments ago by Apti Alaudinov, Commander of the Russian 'Akhmat' Special Forces. The capture of Martynovka gives Russia access to the R200 highway, which will make supplying Sudzha much easier.In the south Borki and Spalnoe are under Ukrainian control. Russian sources claim Ukraine does not give up trying to take Giri, sending wave after wave.Excluding grey-zones and DRG operations, the area of confirmed Ukrainian control is 470 sqkm.

Russian forces have captured the fortifications and advanced beyond the main line of defense in the Donbass built by Ukraine between 2014-2017. Ukrainian… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces captured the trench system west of New York and advanced further north within the city too – Toretsk direction.78% of New York is now under Russian control.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian defensive lines continue to crumble in ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - While Ukrainian authorities continue focusing on the Kursk region of Russia, Russian forces captured 23.8 sqkm in Pokrovsk in just a single day. Russian troops are now 11.7 km away from Pokrovsk. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian defensive lines continue to crumble in the Pokrovsk direction.Russian forces have captured Orlovka and two thirds of Zhuravka. Russian troops also captured a third of Nikolaivka and advanced 700 meters west along the Progres railway.Ukrainian forces withdrew from Orlovka to their fortification just west – Ukrainian sources confirm.Russia has now captured 32.1 sqkm in just the Pokrovsk sector in the past 36 hours. The distance to Pokrovsk is now 10.9 km.
